website_summaries.verdict: These German beer table knockoffs are good quality tables that fit perfectly into smaller width spaces.
pros: Constructed of durable wood and a heavy load iron frame
Easy to fold for storage or portability
Easy to set up and take down
cons: Some buyers say this option shows up with dings, scratches, and other minor issues
Some found the benches to be a little wobbly

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected for $100
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected for $100, couple of nicks on the wood here and there but nothing easily noticeable and I'm sure there will be a lot more as it gets used, so no big deal. Easy to set up and portable, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bobzdar

customer_reviews.title: Should have order myself one
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of time. My daughter loves it. It was a gift to her. Well constructed she says but ony time will tell... I a chance to visit my daughter this pass weekend and saw this table set... Nice but a little off the bench legs aren't exactly squared and the table differently could have been wider...but it's functional and cool, it folds away and stores without taking up any space
customer_reviews.author: Bjam

customer_reviews.title: The table and benches look terrific. I am confident that they can survive humid ...
customer_reviews.text: As another buyer suggested, I sanded off the poorly applied finish and put on 3 coats of spar varnish. The table and benches look terrific. I am confident that they can survive humid northwest summers. The mechanism for folding the legs is ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to set up and tear down. The quality is surprisingly good. We used this at Thanksgiving to accommodate a few extra guests. It's sturdy enough even for a fairly big dude like me (I think 500 lbs is the max for each bench). The only issue I had is that the packaging is pretty awful. There's no protective padding when these are shipped. Our box had holes and tears all over. Fortunately, the item itself wasn't damaged, but that was sheer luck.
customer_reviews.author: PeeBee

customer_reviews.title: nice bench table set
customer_reviews.text: nice bench table set, longer than I thought it'd be. the legs folds out and snaps into place with latches. pretty sturdy. the top of the table and benches are polished finished so it's smooth and weather resistant but the sides and bottom are not so it's just sanded down and a little rough
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The product is good enough. The under side is not stained or treated. Huge spot was filled with wood putty. Box was open at both ends with wear from mailing transport. It is 69&1/4 inch in length ... not 70 inches. We have original German beer table and benches. These dimensions are not the same, but I knew it when I ordered. Good enough. Low weather rating because it would definitely need more treatment. Picked up a few slivers handling. Couple of dents, one nail/screw not completely set.. but that is mass production and shipment woes. Good enough ...
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice set for the patio or wherever you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money... This is a very nice set for the patio or wherever you want to set it up..... Good quality
customer_reviews.author: james evans

customer_reviews.title: Crappy customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The package arrive very damaged, I reached out to the vendor but did not receive a response. The wood is very soft and easily damaged. The legs need to have coaster or something on the bottom of legs to not scratch wooden or title floors.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, good for small children
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. I weigh 105 pounds and the benches sag when I sit in the middle of them. Return policy is awful; shipping to return costs more than the purchase price so now I'm stuck with them. Do not recommend for average-sized people.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this to arrive. After opening the box it was clear this table is poorly made. Some sort of putty is used. It is very flimsy and NOT worth over $100. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Gardening Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for porch or covered outdoor use. I am using it for gardening and seed starting. I recommend it for everyone, but caution obese people, to keep a seat at the part of the bench with a support leg. I weigh 330 lbs, and notice scary flex if I attempt to sit in the middle of the bench. This would be a great table for healthy body weight people!
customer_reviews.author: Sessums71

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, will not last long.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made the hardware is very flimsy. The top of the table had knots in the wood that were deep. They filled them with cheap wood putty which does not match the wood and they didn’t even fill all of the knots. This is good enough for my small grandchildren to use outside but because of the poor construction the metal is already resting after a week. We will mostly keep this in the house or the barn.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M

customer_reviews.title: They are great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are great quality for the price, but the table and benches arrived with lots of scratches and looks poorly finished in places. Also the benches feel rather flimsy and started to sag while just two medium-sized people were sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun NR

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: The price for the usefulness and quality of this item is so worth it that I came back to buy a second one. I use one on my covered porch for my outdoor crafts, playing cards with friends, eating, and will bring it in my yard around my fire pit for extra seating. I keep my second one in my craft room. Its not too wide or too long so it’s easy to fit anywhere. It’s easy to assemble (just snap the legs open and it’s ready to go), lightweight, and sturdy. Easy to fold down and store. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Giantex 70” 3-Piece Portable Folding Picnic Beer Table with Seating Set Wooden Top Picnic Table for Patio Outdoor Activities Garden Use, 30” Table Height. Buy at your own risk!!!! And for all the trouble, no contact provided to me until 6 days later and constantly looking for the delivery that never happened I got a whopping $5 dollar credit from Amazon. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Christyana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table/bench set!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Exactly what I was hoping for; bought two sets! Elegant in their simplicity, these tables and benches are well made, ready to simply pop the legs down out of the box, easy to fold up and store, nice natural wood. I pushed the two tables together to make a dinner table on my patio at Thanksgiving, and pushed the two extra benches together upside the patio wall for additional seating.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lil'

customer_reviews.title: Cute set, so so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheap table and benches. We bought them last minute for a party and it was a great decision. The pieces made the area welcoming and could withstand the the changes of weather (rain, windy). If you are looking for surdy and long lasting table and benches, this wouldn't be the set for you. But if you are looking for a set to use indoors in an artistic way or ok with replacing it after 2-3years outdoor, then def get it.
customer_reviews.author: BeatBoyNY

customer_reviews.title: Great Beer Garden Table and Bench
customer_reviews.text: I had bought my first set in Germany in 1997 and they are just alike except the table from Germany is about 2 feet longer. They are great tables for outside parties. Easy to store and use when needed.
customer_reviews.author: AJG

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a wholly unattractive table but the quality is certainly lacking. There are poorly filled voids in the wood and the legs are really thin metal and are installed crooked which makes the table wobble. I like the design of the folding legs and with a little better quality metal and wood this would be a great table for every day use. As it is it’s for temporary use only in my opinion. I would gladly pay double for the same table with better materials but sadly that’s not available as far as I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schroder

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. I was looking for benches to use outdoors as extra seating, that would fold closed for better storage. Something good looking on its own, not grey plastic. And the key was foldable. I either found benches that were $100 each, or ugly, and these are rather nice looking and again, the price. The table is nice as well in that it is a folding table that doesnt have to have a tablecloth for outdoor serving. Yes, the wood is dinged in spots and the paint on the metal is chipping. But again, the PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaR

customer_reviews.title: Loved for our purpose
customer_reviews.text: We did not get this to use as a picnic table but as displays for a retail show. I liked that it was smaller and the benches could use to add height to the small retail space we had. The benches would in my opinion only hold smaller people or kids. My son sat on one and it sagged in the middle. He is 6'2 and 175lbs. We will keep it and use it more in the future and possibly on camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: Water pools on both table and benches. The wood is splitting on the bench and table top.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not the most sturdy for adults
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble by following the directions. Folds easily as well. The bench’s are not very sturdy. If you have multiple adults sitting on a single bench of bows or bends pretty significantly. I suggest the middle of the bench be for kids and adults sit on the edges directly above the support bars. We think it was still a good value for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I bought this table to use in our apartment's common area and to take with us on camping trips. It's a great table! Easy to fold and transport, while also being much prettier than a standard plastic folding table (and with benches for seating). Only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because some of the edges are a little rough and need sanding, I wasn't expecting to have to do any additional work on the table. Otherwise this is great, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not as strong & watch for cracks.
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful but the overall quality is mediocre. The table cracked a bit and the bench as well. It is still usable for now but it will likely get worse as we continue to use it. We have only been using it for a month, about 7 times. The table arrived with a little crack. Been too busy to contact the seller and when I did it was About a day or 2 after the return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged/Chipped- Quality is Lacking
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality- Arrived Damaged. Seller was great at working it out but I would not buy this product again. A lot smaller than the normal German Style Beer Tables. For the Price- would expect better quality!
customer_reviews.author: ALynn

customer_reviews.title: We loved this tables and chairs
customer_reviews.text: We loved this tables and chairs. We have parties all the time and it is great that they can break down.
customer_reviews.author: Jo D.

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the application.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it was too flimsy and small for our application. Really good if you only want to use them once and a while. I would guess that they could not be left outside because of weight/size and also because its only plywood on top.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's not safe
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible deal, you cant not seat a child there.very weak
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great faux beer garden bench set!
customer_reviews.text: These benches and table are a total knock off from the real deal but totally worth it! They are relatively sturdy, foldable and slim enough that you can use them for parties indoor and out! They might not last forever but probably will do for a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine S. Holub

customer_reviews.title: Good compact foldable table
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and compact table. Light weight. One side of one of our benches locking assembly seems to be slightly to big and has to be forced in or out of the lock down mechanism. Which is sometimes tough to lock/unlock in place. Also since these benches are light weight, highly recommended not to sit on the very edges. Might just find yourself on the floor. Benches has held two adults and one child on a single bench fine though
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: pretty sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned after seeing some reviews indicating it is not sturdy. Just received the package and they are: 1) Very well packaged 2) No assembly what-so-ever. Setup in no time 3) Very well designed 4) Very nice over all
customer_reviews.author: JKY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wood
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the wood color, and the design. My sadness comes because of 4 noticeable spots on the beautiful wood where wood putty was placed and along on of the edges a 7 inch section either did not get sanded down or enough lacquer so out of the box it splintered off which I had to remove for safety sake.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a little banged up, but you can't beat the quality for the price. We used it all summer, and can fit three adults on the bench snugly. It fit perfectly on our small back patio, folds up easily, and seems very sturdy. I think we'll get several more seasons out of this as long as we continue to store it inside when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks stylish.  Easy to set up/pack away. Great price point too.
customer_reviews.text: This set is so functional and stylish. It folds easy and stored flat. Not heavy at all so easily managed by one person. We pull it out as a community hang out spot with our neighbors and have used it multiple times. It’s a great table and bench set. I’m glad I chose this one out of all the options available.
customer_reviews.author: Grazia M. Ruskin

customer_reviews.title: Not great for dancing on.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a table resembling the German beer tent table. Obviously this is a much smaller version. But if any large Germans plan on dancing on your table I would skip this one. Picnics and small family dinners outdoors are more this tables speed. No assembling either!
customer_reviews.author: Jennapdh

customer_reviews.title: beer table, craft table, birthday table
customer_reviews.text: love it!!! exactly what i was searching... i bought thinking on my daughters birthday and coming festivities where we will need additional seats... its a little sturdy but i prefer rustic than plastic... and will be perfect as a hooby table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK but
customer_reviews.text: The set is a perfect fit for our lake house. It was easy to assemble and looked as pictured. Only disappointing when the bench wood cracked the first weekend of use.
customer_reviews.author: Honora Gathings

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Real wood, real metal. Great for outdoor use or a slim dining space (like I have!)I love it.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We have this outside on our patio - great value! Not super sturdy but for the price its sturdy enough, doesn't seem like it would break or anything but I wouldn't try to stand on it.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer2

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted/needed
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should. I like they it folds down so easy and flat. This makes it easy to use with our food truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Small but fits in small space.
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy but I like the size. Nice finish. Great for what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, light, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and compact. I originally bought two of these for a baby shower and spray painted the legs white to match the aesthetic. They are so easy to transport and worked well for a small outdoor gathering. At home, I placed two of the tables side by side to create a larger outdoor table. Simply perfect, can’t beat this price... and very “Serena & Lily” vibes with the white painted legs. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: pretty flimsy, nuts and bolt stick out everywhere, and one of the locks that hold the stands when folded does not engage on one bench at all. Does the trick though
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: It is a great thing to have
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly, kind of narrow, but they get the job done. We use them every time we go camping. It is a great thing to have, they take up very little space in the trailer when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Was to use but smells strong!
customer_reviews.text: East to use and perfect size for Oktoberfest and as a drink bar at gatherings. Benches great for extra seating. Smells insanely strong of chemicals and wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to set up or fold away
customer_reviews.text: Clearly not as sturdy as what we had in Germany, but if you don’t have 4 adults dancing on top of the benches, I think it will be ok for sitting! Looks good. Easy to fold up and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Seats are very flimsy and two heavy adults have to sit very gently on this. It looks nice but be aware that it is cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: april tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: I am 150 lbs and feel like the metal is not strong enough to hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: bench is wobbly. I am 150 lbs and feel like the metal is not strong enough to hold up my weight. I let my daughter do her arts and craft on this table. i think the table top and bench tops are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: ... only gave it 4 because the benches tip over easily just because they are so narrow
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 because the benches tip over easily just because they are so narrow. But this table is made with great material and super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with some defects.
customer_reviews.text: Easy ensemble. Looks and smells great. However just received and when unboxed it had deep gash in table top and also part of the metal piece on bottom of the beach was detached. The package had no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jenness

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Water beads and wipes right off the weatherproof finish, legs are strong and it's very easy to fold up and transport.
customer_reviews.author: M BENSON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: authentic German Biergarten table/bench set - sturdy and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... got it but other than that it is a good set
customer_reviews.text: Had a big screw indentation in it when we got it but other than that it is a good set
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, arrived well and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a Trade show. It ships well and is easy to open up and set up. It’s not as sturdy as I expected but great for a small booth at a trade show and for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful in my garden. Easy to erect and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Handy for events
customer_reviews.text: Convenient for occasional event use, easy storage, easy setup. Great design concept but some latches were assembled crooked so it was tough to latch in an upright position. Need to make sure weight on benches is evenly distributed or you may have a teeter-totter unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great set, damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Amazing table and bench set. Unfortunately one arrived damaged in shipping. We now have three sets for parties. Friends want them too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Easy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: The outdoor table and bench set is beautiful, easy to unfold and attractive to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Holding up!
customer_reviews.text: These look great in our small beer garden! We were concerned about sturdiness and the finish. Its been raining for weeks and they still look good! Sturdy enough for all sizes, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: ... reminds me of Germany and the fest tables we love
customer_reviews.text: This reminds me of Germany and the fest tables we love them
customer_reviews.author: Julie Skinner

customer_reviews.title: We love this table!
customer_reviews.text: This table arrived assembled and has been sturdy enough so far! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table SO much. It stores easily and I get complimented on it all the time. It's exactly what I was needing and looking for. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jdmangrum

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic table for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and take down. And can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Hnj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing picnic table. It is perfectly sized and works well. I love that it is compact and folds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Already Assembled Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic picnic table that comes already assembled. No tools required to build. It fits about three people on each bench. The width of the table is very large but there's still plenty of space. And the price is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Easy to use. Fast response from seller. I use it everyday at my backyard with my 5 years old son. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Yoon J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and the wood was very pretty. We used it at my grandaughters birthday party and everyone wanted to know where I brought it. It was sturdy and served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This table is super cute! It’s pretty small but that works for the space that we have. It isn’t super sturdy and does wiggle a little but nothing horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Finlayson’s

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The table is ok, but the bench is terrible. The bench needs to be redesigned with something in the middle. Looks weak and bend when you seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit wobbly, but good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, but it looks good enough and serves its function.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Riggle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use the benches for decor...I am obsessed with this table. GREAT quality and perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My family love this table and chair. We can eat and drink with 8 people
customer_reviews.author: Punyavee Boonsuk

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, good looking, and simple design, live in Az and had table outside in summer heat, still holding up but definitely can see some wear and table and seats are no longer smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine whitt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and so easy to set up. Light weight so I can easily move around if necessary. For now I use only 1 bench as I live by myself and need working station more than dinner set. It looks just like how I picture for my place.
customer_reviews.author: Han D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with it!! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Wayment

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wedding gift the couple loves it! Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Positively love this table. Easy to store and no assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Affordable Table
customer_reviews.text: This is great, wood table at an affordable price. We have had it in our outdoor beer garden area, and it’s held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Landen Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s a great deal but don’t expect something super sturdy it’s more of a lightweight table and benches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped wood
customer_reviews.text: One of the benches is warped. Other than that it would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ditch the plastic folding set, this is so much better
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Quality! I love that this set feels like it will last me for years it is so sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonneli

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! I am so impressed with the ease, simplicity and beauty of this table!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price vs quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price very good and my kids love to play in that table, very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jaya Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a seasonal cottage and love that you can fold for storage. Looks good and seems pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Beth R.

customer_reviews.title: German Biergarten in USA
customer_reviews.text: it's a great set, the table is not as wide as we know it from the german biergarten, but it's a good set. it unfolds very easily, it's lightweight but seems pretty sturdy. we just set it up outside on the side of the house, let's hope it holds as long as we need it!
customer_reviews.author: US

customer_reviews.title: Good size saver table
customer_reviews.text: The size is good. The sturdiness is not terrible, but is more wobbly than I would like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do love it but do wish it was just a smidge sturdier in the frame construction.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great for biergartens!
customer_reviews.text: So well made and easy to unfold. Would like there to be more colors to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: Tink65

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made on Amazon. Perfect for my computer!
customer_reviews.author: Sue D Nym

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my smaller width deck
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Perfect for my smaller width deck.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: ... the farm brewery that I manage and they are perfect. They look great yet they are light enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tables for the farm brewery that I manage and they are perfect. They look great yet they are light enough that I can move them around myself without any help. Great purchase, will certainly be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected for the price! It's a little wobbly but overall sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Value but Damaged in Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great value and beautiful table but damaged in shipping due to insufficient packaging materials
customer_reviews.author: John  Davis

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: One of the two latches that secures the table when its set up isn't latching - I can't use the table at all. Benches are nice, and latch securely. I did have to put some padding on the bottoms of the benches. They are tippy and won't sit properly. The stick on furniture felt circles helped stabilize them. UPDATE: I was contacted by the seller to remedy the table latch. They provided good customer service and I've got a table that I can use now. It is secure and stable. Excited to use this during the warm weather!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaller

customer_reviews.title: Meh experience but expected...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously at this price point it is a chinese knockoff of the original German beer tables which are much better quality wise. Ours arrived damaged already, no protection or packing material in the box. Once opened, found more production flaws and was pretty disappointed with the overall quality level despite production origin. Overall table and benches are sturdy, actually better than expected. Giantex did an ok job handling the customer service and providing compensation for the damage. I will do the same as other reviewers have done. Sand it down, apply my own semi gloss and sealer.
customer_reviews.author: ilo

customer_reviews.title: Used it several times during holiday sturdy but easy to set up The edges needed sanding ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times during holiday sturdy but easy to set up The edges needed sanding in several places to prevent snagging of clothes Great size easy for 1 person to set up 4 stars is for the rough edges well worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship. Screws not all the way in
customer_reviews.text: Wood is light weight and soft. Arrived damaged with all three pieces having gouges, scratches, and crushed,splintered areas. Poor workmanship. Screws not all the way in, nuts not tightened all the way, areas on the table top thad were missed when coating was applied. Metal frame seems cheap and not well put together. Likely to not last long. Underside of table and benches not coated at all.
customer_reviews.author: NC AEROMED

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy. It's the exact size I wanted however so ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, not sturdy. It's the exact size I wanted however so I kept it. Also the packaging was ridiculous. The bench was literally sticking out of the box and was exposed to shipping scratches/wear. Pretty ridiculous, in actuality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cagayao

product_meta.title: Giantex 70” 3-Piece Portable Folding Picnic Beer Table with Seating Set Wooden Top Picnic Table for Patio Outdoor Activities Garden Use, 30” Table Height
feature_bullets: 【Giantex Beer Bench Set】: Giantex benches and table set could offer a perfect place to take beer and a rest when you having leisure time outdoor. Ideal for trips to the park or setting up as a fixture in your backyard, this picnic table is the perfect outdoor essential.

【Wood Material】: The wood bench top is made of high class Chinese fir wood, it is solid and smooth.Giantex beer table set constructed with heavy-load iron frame which make it durable and and sturdy in daily use.
【Foldable Design】: The foldable design makes it easy for you to storage and carry. You could easy fold it and store in compact locations.
【Suitable Daily Use】: Chine fir wood surface are easy to clean and suitable for outdoor use, also it could offer a raw yet refined edge to any arrangement.

【Simple Set Up】: No assemble is required. All pieces of the table set are connect together making for a quick and east set-uo and take-down process. If you have any problem, you could contact us by the email,out customer service with contact within 24 hours. Overall Dimension Of Table: 70”X18”X29.5”(LXWXH), Overall Dimension Of Bench: 70”X9”X18”（LXWXH).
